original_text: Yea, the light of the wicked shall be put out, and the spark of his fire shall not shine.
korean_text: 악인의 빛은 꺼지고 그의 불꽃은 빛나지 않을 것이요

sentences.original_text: Yea, the light of the wicked shall be put out
and the spark of his fire shall not shine
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 불의 불꽃은 빛나지 않을 것입니다
